title: Velo Podcast: Pogi’s New Colnago Race Rig, the Most Aero Road Bike, and Tons of Sea Otter Tech
content:
We go deep on the latest tech from Sea Otter Classic, whether the Colnago V5Rs needs to do more, and a roundup of tech and trends from Paris-Roubaix.

Read the full article at Velo Podcast: Pogi’s New Colnago Race Rig, the Most Aero Road Bike, and Tons of Sea Otter Tech on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
